definitions.body: .]; usu. of land, etc. (sts.=deserted), Is 49:8, Ez Eze 33:28 ([[מֵאֵין עוֹבֵר]]), Eze 35:12 (read [[שָֽׁמְמוּ]] Qr Co Toy Krae; >Kt [[שׁממה]]), v:Eze 35:15; [[הֶחְָרָבוֹת הַשּׁׂמִמוֹת]] Eze 36:4 (‖[[הֶעָרִים הַנֱּעֶזׇבוֹת ]] [[שַׁמּוֹת]]) v:Eze 36:3 is prob. corrupt, Co [[שְׁאָט]] as v:Eze 36:5, Hi-Sm from [[שׁמה]] = [[נשׁם]], Toy reads [[נָשׁׂם]], Krae [[נָשׁׂם]];—pt. fpl. as n. = desolate places Is 49:19, Is 61:4 (both ‖[[חֳרָבוֹת ]]), v:Is 61:4 (cf. [[שְׁמָמָה]] Is 62:4); = desolations Da 9:18, Da 9:26.

be appalled, awestruck, usu. at ([[עַל]]) judgments on others, Le 26:32 (H), Je 2:12 (v. II. [[[חָרֵב]]]), Ez Eze 26:16, Eze 27:35, Eze 28:19, Is 52:14, Job 17:8, cf. 1Ki 9:8 = 2Ch 7:12, Je 18:16 Je 19:8, Je 49:17, Je 50:13; on oneself Ps 40:16 ([[עַל־עֵקֶב]]).—Is 42:14 v. [[[נשׁם]]].

definitions.body: be desolated, of roads Le 26:22 (H), Is 33:8, bamoth Am 7:9 (‖[[יֶחֱרָָבוּ ]]), altars Ez Eze 6:4; cf. Ez Eze 36:35, Am 9:14, Je 33:10; [[הַנְּשַׁמָּה]] Ez Eze 36:36 the desolated (sc. land, in fig.).
be appalled Je 4:9, La 4:5, Ez Eze 4:17, Eze 30:7, c. [[עַל]] rei Job 18:20.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 ms. [[הֲשִׁמּ֫וֹתָ]] Job 16:7, etc.; Impf. 3 ms. [[יַשּׁים]] (Ges:§ 67 y) Je 49:20, Je 50:45, 3 mpl. sf. [[וַיְשִׁמֵּם]] 1Sa 5:6, 1 pl. [[נַשִּׁים]] Nu 21:30, etc.; Imv. mpl. [[הָשַׁמּוּ]] (Ges:§ 67 v) Job 21:5; Inf. abs. [[הַשְׁמֵם]] Mic 6:13; Pt. [[מַשְׁמִים]] Ez Eze 3:15;—

devastate, ravage, acc. pers. 1Sa 5:6, Ez Eze 20:26, Ho 2:14 (fig. of vine), Job 16:7; acc. loc. Le 26:31, Le 26:32 (H) Je 10:25, Ez Eze 30:12, Eze 30:14, Ps 79:7, so (acc. am.) Nu 21:30 (poem in JE), Mic 6:13;—Ez Eze 14:8 v. [[שִׂים]]

be appalled, astounded, ´[[בִּ]]: that, because, Is 59:16, Is 63:5; [[עַל]] rei Da 8:27; ´[[עבּתוֹכִי יִשְׁתּ]]: Ps 143:4 (cf. 1 pl. [[נשתומם]] Ecclus Sir 43:24).
